languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, теперь мы связаны с вами контрактом. Ваши представители могут обращаться к Дому Орселлио в любое время, и мы откликнемся. И еще... Храните дитя как зеницу ока. И не забывайте, что у вас на борту будущий новатор Дома {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец, теперь мы связаны с вами контрактом. Ваши представители могут обращаться к Дому Орселлио в любое время, и мы откликнемся. И еще... Храните дитя как зеницу ока. И не забывайте, что у вас на борту будущий новатор Дома {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Rogue Trader, we are now bound by the terms of the contract. Your representatives may contact House Orsellio at any time, and we will respond. And one more thing... Protect the child like the apple of your eye. Remember that you have the future Novator of a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House aboard your vessel."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, теперь мы связаны с вами контрактом. Ваши представители могут обращаться к Дому Орселлио в любое время, и мы откликнемся. И еще... Храните дитя как зеницу ока. И не забывайте, что у вас на борту будущий новатор Дома {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}".

Protect the child like the apple of your eye. Remember that you have the future novator of a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} house aboard your vessel."

Protect the child like the apple of your eye. Remember that you have the future Novator of a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House aboard your vessel."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “行商浪人，我们如今受合约条款约束。您的代表可以在任何时候联系奥赛罗家族，而我们会及时答复。还有件事情……请保护好这个孩子，就像保护您的掌上明珠一样。别忘了，{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}未来的大族长，就在您的船上。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, we are now bound by the terms of the contract. Your representatives may contact House Orsellio at any time, and we will respond. And one more thing... Protect the child like the apple of your eye. Remember that you have the future Novator of a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House aboard your vessel."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，我们如今受合约条款约束。您的代表可以在任何时候联系奥塞罗家族，而我们会及时答复。还有件事情……请保护好这个孩子，就像保护您的掌上明珠一样。别忘了，{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}未来的大族长，就在您的船上。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente, ahora nos unen los términos del tratado. Sus representantes podrán contactar con la casa Orsellio en cualquier momento y responderemos. Una cosa más... proteja a esa niña como si fuera su propia hija. Recuerde que lleva a bordo de su nave a la futura Novator de una casa de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, we are now bound by the terms of the contract. Your representatives may contact House Orsellio at any time, and we will respond. And one more thing... Protect the child like the apple of your eye. Remember that you have the future Novator of a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House aboard your vessel."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente, ahora nos unen los términos del tratado. Sus representantes podrán contactar con la casa Orsellio en cualquier momento y responderemos. Una cosa más... proteja a esa niña como si fuera su propia hija. Recuerde que lleva a bordo de su nave a la futura Novator de una casa de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「自由開拓者、契約条件に従おう。貴君の代表はいつでもオーセリオ家に連絡でき、我々はそれに返答しよう。そしてもうひとつ…この子を大切に守ってもらいたい。{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}の未来のノベイターを乗船させていることを忘れないでいただきたい」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, we are now bound by the terms of the contract. Your representatives may contact House Orsellio at any time, and we will respond. And one more thing... Protect the child like the apple of your eye. Remember that you have the future Novator of a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House aboard your vessel."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者、契約条件に従おう。貴君の代表はいつでもオーセリオ家に連絡でき、我々はそれに返答しよう。そしてもうひとつ…この子を大切に守ってもらいたい。{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}の未来のノベイターを乗船させていることを忘れないでいただきたい」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, wir sind nun an die Vertragsbedingungen gebunden. Eure Vertreter können sich jederzeit an das Haus Orsellio wenden, und wir werden reagieren. Und noch etwas ... beschützt das Kind wie Euren Augapfel. Denkt daran, Ihr habt die künftige Novatorin eines Hauses der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} an Bord Eures Schiffs."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, we are now bound by the terms of the contract. Your representatives may contact House Orsellio at any time, and we will respond. And one more thing... Protect the child like the apple of your eye. Remember that you have the future Novator of a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House aboard your vessel."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, wir sind nun an die Vertragsbedingungen gebunden. Eure Vertreter können sich jederzeit an das Haus Orsellio wenden, und wir werden reagieren. Und noch etwas ... beschützt das Kind wie Euren Augapfel. Denkt daran, Ihr habt die künftige Novatorin eines Hauses der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} an Bord Eures Schiffs."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, nous sommes maintenant liés par contrat. Vos représentants pourront contacter la maison Orsellio à tout moment, et nous répondrons. Encore une chose... Protégez cette Enfant comme la prunelle de vos yeux. N'oubliez pas qu'il s'agit là de la future Novator d'une maison de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, we are now bound by the terms of the contract. Your representatives may contact House Orsellio at any time, and we will respond. And one more thing... Protect the child like the apple of your eye. Remember that you have the future Novator of a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House aboard your vessel."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, nous sommes maintenant liés par contrat. Vos représentants pourront contacter la maison Orsellio à tout moment, et nous répondrons. Encore une chose... Protégez cette enfant comme la prunelle de vos yeux. N'oubliez pas qu'il s'agit là de la future Novator d'une maison de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, artık kontrat şartlarıyla birbirimize bağlıyız. Temsilcileriniz her daim Orsellio Hanesi ile iletişime geçebilir, çağrılarınıza daima yanıt verilecektir. Bir şey daha var: Çocuğu göz bebeğiniz gibi koruyun. Unutmayın, geminizde bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} Hanesi'nin gelecekteki Rota Reisi'ni taşıyor olacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, we are now bound by the terms of the contract. Your representatives may contact House Orsellio at any time, and we will respond. And one more thing... Protect the child like the apple of your eye. Remember that you have the future Novator of a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House aboard your vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, artık kontrat şartlarıyla birbirimize bağlıyız. Temsilcileriniz her daim Orsellio Hanesi ile iletişime geçebilir ve çağrınıza her daim yanıt vereceğimizin sözünü veriyoruz. Bir şey daha var: Çocuğu göz bebeğiniz gibi koruyun. Unutmayın, geminizde bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} Hanesi'nin gelecekteki Rota Reisi'ni taşıyor olacaksınız."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
